2343.text: FEATURE - Singapore sees prestige in hosting WTO .

2347.text: " As one of the world 's most externally oriented economies , Singapore has a disproportionately large stake in the WTO , " said Desmond Supple , economist at research house I.D.E.A .

2350.text: In a stand some analysts linked to controversy over Singapore 's caning of an American teenager for vandalism , then - U.S. Trade Representative Mickey Kantor had said the meeting ought to be held where the WTO was going to be headquartered .

2352.text: But Singapore had the support of other WTO members .

2353.text: Derek da Cunha , senior fellow at the Institute of Policy Studies ( ISEAS ) , said Singapore 's hosting of the conference " carries a great deal of symbolism for the city - state , underscoring its commitment to free trade and its trading links across the globe . "

2355.text: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

2356.text: In June , the WTO hailed Singapore for its open market policies but the European Union and other trading powers called on Singapore to speed up the opening of its services sector .

2363.text: Supple said any political gains the Singapore government would get from the WTO meeting -- ahead of a general election due by April 1997 -- would depend on how successful it was in pushing its economic agenda .

3380.text: NHL ICE HOCKEY - CANUCKS RW BURE SUSPENDED FOR ONE GAME .

3382.text: Vancouver Canucks star right wing Pavel Bure was suspended for one game by the National Hockey League and fined $ 1,000 Friday for his hit on Buffalo Sabres defenceman Garry Galley on Wednesday .

3383.text: Bure received a double - minor penalty for high - sticking with 2:22 left in the first period of Wednesday 's 7 - 6 overtime win by Vancouver after colliding with Galley in Buffalo zone .

3385.text: " Mr Bure left his feet to deliver a forearm blow to Mr Galley as he was about to be checked legally by his opponent , " said NHL discipline chief Brian Burke in handing out the suspension .

3387.text: Bure , who is struggling with only nine goals and 12 assists in 26 games , will miss Saturday 's home game against Ottawa .
